      • getClientAnchor

        ClientAnchor getClientAnchor()
        Return defines position of this anchor in the sheet. The anchor is the yellow box/balloon that is rendered on top of the sheets when the comment is visible. To associate a comment with a different cell, use setAddress(org.apache.poi.ss.util.CellAddress).(${t_42387a7d8ad247e99a4416699eb0f7ec})
        Returns:
        defines position of this anchor in the sheet(${t_9ca60d598f1c423291bf9bfec781f248})
